title: The AI that knows you're about to resign before you do - and warns your boss
text:
Artificial intelligence created by an Oxford University spin-out could soon be used by UK firms to predict if employees are about to resign.

British institutions including Kew Gardens and the Ashmolean Museum are being offered the tool which takes into account factors such as age, pay, benefits and work location to spot unhappy employees.

Zegami, which created the AI, said it would allow HR professionals and organisations to get a more "detailed and clear view on the role staff play at their organisations".

The company has already partnered with a number of high-profile institutions since it was founded in 2016, including Oxford University, the Royal Botanic Gardens at Kew and the British Library....
